statements: DELETE FROM anonymized_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM anonymized_data WHERE id = 1 AND last_name = 'Doe';
DELETE FROM anonymized_data WHERE research_topic = 'Machine Learning' AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM personal_data WHERE id = 1 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM identifiable_data WHERE user_id = 1002 AND phone_number = '+1234567890';
DELETE FROM Secure_Data WHERE person_id IN (SELECT id FROM Personal_Data WHERE first_name = 'John');
DELETE FROM Secure_Data WHERE person_id = 101 AND security_question = 'What is your favorite color?';
